description: This dataset represents existing and proposed multi-use trails in the Chicago Southland and surrounding region. It is an aggregation of data from CMAP, SSMMA, and the Active Transportation Alliance.

metadata.attribution: South Suburban Mayors and Managers Association

name: SSMMA Multi-Use Trails
